node.detail_zh: 患者為第 #4851 宗個案患者的丈夫，居於粉嶺華心邨華勉樓，在大圍交通城地下管理處任職保安，8 月 24 日工作期間曾與第 #4824 宗個案患者因大廈漏水問題見面 10 多分鐘，當時有戴口罩，但第 #4824 宗個案患者沒戴口罩。他無外遊紀錄，8 月 27 日曾到威爾斯親王醫院接受藥物治療，但 8 月 26 日的檢測結果呈陰性，9 月 2 日出現發燒症狀，同日到粉嶺和興體育館接受全民檢測採樣。
node.detail_en: The patient is the husband of patient #4851, residing at Wah Min House, Wah Sum Estate, Fanling, and works at the management office at Transport City Building, Tai Wai as a security guard. On August 24, he met patient #4824 regarding a leakage problem for around 10 minutes, himself with a mask whereas patient #4824 does not have a mask on. He has no travel history, visited Prince of Wales Hospital on August 27 for pharmacological treatment, but tested negative for the virus on August 26. He developed fever on September 2, and attended the Universal Community Testing Programme at Wo Hing Sports Centre, Fanling on the same day.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.description_zh: 大圍交通城出現小型爆發，6 樓及地下管理處分別出現確診個案。

node.location_en: Wah Min House, Wah Sum Estate
